comment.author: 42826854@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Heritage Key, and we'd be extremely honoured to have this added to the group! Awesome what the Brooklyn Museum is doing as it comes to 'open' (and instant) communication about their research, a real example! (So I could not but help but blog about it. ;))
